nodes.text: The Cloudshape Falls were waterfalls located on the planet of Alderaan. Leia Organa, heir to the Royal House of Alderaan, compared their great billowing spray to a cloud that came to nest on the river. Nash Windrider, a native of Alderaan, had offered Thane Kyrell to take him to the Falls one day. However, in 0 BBY, the Galactic Empire used its Death Star battle station to destroy the entire planet before Kyrell had a chance to set foot on Alderaan.
